title: Breathtaking Views, Designer Backsplash, Walk-in Closets*

posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 824 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Come home to The Highlands at Red Hawk in Castle Rock, CO.', 'Here, you can dive into a lifestyle that brings you ongoing relaxation and convenience.', 'We offer 1 bedroom apartments, 2 bedroom apartments, and 3 bedroom apartments that are complete with everything you need to feel right at home.', 'Our location gives you the power to experience downtown Castle Rock, the surrounding Denver area, and the best local attractions in Douglas County.', 'You will love having easier commutes and better travel with close access to I-25.', 'Our floor plans are highlighted by stunning features and finishes and provide you with breathtaking mountain views.', 'Discover spectacular community amenities such as a state-of-the-art fitness center, shimmering swimming pool, sun deck, and beyond.', 'With gorgeous landscaping and the right combination of apartment features, our community is one of a kind.', 'Join The Highlands at Red Hawk today.', 'Features:', 'Electric Fireplace*, Granite Countertops, Washer & Dryer in each Apartment, Designer Fixtures and Finishes, Stainless Steel Appliances, Breakfast Bars, Pantry*, Walk-in Closets*, Designer Backsplash, Walk-in Shower with Custom Tile', '* Select Units Only', 'Community Amenities:', 'On-Site Management, Easy Access to Freeways, Guest Parking, Public Parks', 'Nearby, On-Site Maintenance, Beautiful Landscaping, Attached Garage, Clubhouse, Easy Access to Shopping and Dining, Shimmering Swimming Pool, Breathtaking Views, State-of-the-Art Fitness Center, 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', 'Pet Policy', 'Up to 2 pets per apartment.', 'Breed restrictions do apply.', 'Pet Deposit.', 'Non-refundable pet fee.', 'See your community office for more details.', 'Income Requirements:', 'Income must be no less than 2.5X of Lease Rate', 'Interested in more information?', 'Visit link below:', '<URL>', 'Prices are subject
